headline: Alliant Energy Q4 Earnings Surpass Estimates, Sales Increase Y/Y
summary: LNT beats Q4 EPS and revenue estimates as sales rise Y/Y, boosts 2026 outlook and plans $13.4B in capex through 2029.

raw.headline: Alliant Energy Q4 Earnings Surpass Estimates, Sales Increase Y/Y

headline: NRG Energy (NRG) Expands Portfolio With LS Power Asset Acquisition
summary: NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NRG) ranks among billionaire David Tepper’s 10 favorite stocks. On January 30, NRG Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NRG) finalized the purchase of several generation assets and CPower from LS Power. The arrangement expands NRG’s lineup with 18 natural gas-powered generation facilities totaling about 13 GW of capacity, in addition to CPower’s commercial and industrial […]
